news.summary: Elon Musk last month appeared on the "Verdict with Ted Cruz" podcast, where the Texas senator threw him a rare question: Who's the smartest guy you've ever met? Musk didn't hesitate. news.headline: Tesla Stock Rose for 6th Straight Day. Why Robots Matter More Than Tariffs.
news.summary: Tesla  finished strong on Tuesday, rising for the sixth consecutive day as investors weighed the shorter-term impact of tariffs and the longer-term impact of robots. news.headline: Tesla's Slump Has Been A Goldmine For Short Sellers This Year—They've Made $11.5 Billion, Beating Out Nvidia's $9.4 Billion
news.summary: It's been a tough year for Tesla (NASDAQ:TSLA) shareholders, but short sellers are cashing in big time.
